feed.title: Delas Lab
feed.subtitle: Decoding cis regulatory control during development.

entry.title: Jack Williams joins the lab!
entry.content: Jack Williams joins as a postdoctoral fellow after having done his PhD at The Francis Crick Institute. Check out his bio!
entry.summary: Jack Williams joins as a postdoctoral fellow after having done his PhD at The Francis Crick Institute. Check out his bio!

entry.title: Our latest paper is online!
entry.content:
Our latest paper dissecting the cis-regulatory integration of spatial and temporal patterning in neural progenitors is online in Developmenal Cell.

Read the news piece from the Faculty of Life Sciences https://www.ucl.ac.uk/lifesciences-faculty/news/2025/jul/new-study-reveals-how-timing-mechanisms-shape-cell-identity-during-spinal-cord

Read the paper online: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.devcel.2025.06.029
entry.summary: Our latest paper dissecting the cis-regulatory integration of spatial and temporal patterning in neural progenitors is online in Developmenal Cell.

entry.title: Nicola joins
entry.content: Nicola joins the lab for the summer with a BSDB Gurdon/The Company of Biologists Summer Studentship.

entry.content: Junyi (Marcella) presented a poster at the Young Embryologists Network YEN. Highly recommended conference for all trainees!

entry.content: With the prestigious UCL RES, Maria will start her PhD in the lab.
